channel.description: LABS Lab: Configure a playbook that works with custom facts Requirements: • Use the project directory chapter6. • Create an inventory file where ansible1 is member of the host group named file and ansible2 is member of the host group named lamp. • Create a custom facts file that contains a section named packages and set the following variables: smb_package = samba ftp_package = vsftpd db_package = mariadb web_package = httpd firewall_package = firewalld • Create another custom facts file that contains a section named services and set the following variables:
